resources.string:
DAC is a challenge-response based behaviour authentication system shows all its chanllenges and responses in game playing page.
 
 For registration and verification it has 10 and 5 rounds respectively. Every round has four challenges, first three are three random circles and last one is a flashes cirlce. In the case of flashes cirlce, user are not allowed to start the drawing before it disappear.
 
 In Home page DAC has two modes: Practice, Play (for registration and verification).

 Functionality of the Buttons: (Home Page) 
 Practice: If you are new, practice mode of DAC will help you to adjust with DAC's environment. 

 Play: To start the game play (registration or verification). Choose a valid name before start the game. Functionality of all buttons of this page: 
 " " Refresh:For a new challenge(if you miss the clue of flashes circle).
 " " Back: Go Home and send data to the server.

 Help: To know about the functionality of DAC. 
 
 Survery: A survery to know user opinion about DAC. 
 
 Exit: Exit from the system.
 

To report a bug, fill free to send a mail at mdmorshedul.islam@ucalgary.ca.For more information Click Here.
